name: Wonderhouse (Polaris134)
description:
You wake up in the attic of your Aunt Marmalade's house.  It's a big day, and several of your cousins have been gathered here to help make an important decision that will affect the family legacy.

But first, breakfast.

Explore the strange house on your way down to the kitchen, and meet your equally strange cousins along the way.  Deal with wall people, uncover bits of hidden family lore, or take sides in the cold war between the Orrery and the Garden.  (Currently the Orrery is winning, but that can change...)

This short text adventure was begun as part of a workshop at GIFCon 2021.  It is free to play.
